text: Potem nastąpi cisza is a 1965 Polish drama film directed by Janusz Morgenstern. ==Cast== * Tadeusz Łomnicki as Major Swietowiec * Marek Perepeczko as Lieutenant Kolski * Daniel Olbrychski as Olewicz * Barbara Brylska as Ewa * Barbara Sołtysik as Zosia * Kazimierz Fabisiak as Zosia's Father * Witold Pyrkosz as Leoniak * Eugeniusz Korczarowski as Adam * Damian Damięcki as Andrzej * Tadeusz Schmidt as General ==References== ==External links== * Category:1965 films Category:1965 drama films Category:Polish films Category:Polish drama films Category:Polish black-and-white films Category:Polish-language films
title: Potem nastąpi cisza
